text: rupiyal siyayak yayi sitha rupiyal pansiye nottuwak laba demin lotharayi path pahak gath ayakuhata ithiri mudal labadimata dina kipayak thisse manga rakagena sita aapasu ema mudal labadime puwathak rambaukkana nangarayen warthawe.rambaukkana nangaraye lotharayipath alewikarana bandagen lotharayi ganimata puruduwa sitina pirisa thun harasiyaki.dinak wishramika ayaku supurudu paridi wishrama watupa gena banda asalata pamina edina dinum adimata niyamitha lotharayi path pahak gena kamisa sakkuwen mottuwak gena banda atha thaba hanika basrathayata godawiya.ohuda pansiye mottuwa athatagena lachchuwa ara wisse panahe, siye mottu kola thora rupiyal hara siyak ekathu kara hisa osawa balanawita lotharayi milatagath pudgalaya ehi nowiya.wahama lotharayi kawuntarayen eliyata basa lotharayigath pudgalaya sewwada ohu hamu wuye natha.shuwar ekata rupiyal siyak kiyala hithagena thamayi pansiya denna aththe.

me loke kellonam kochchara innawada...........eeth hithagiyathana maligawa kiyanawane.loke dawasakata kollo ki dahaknam kello nisa dukwindinawa athda?eeth kellonam kiyanne "ane apith ehema thamayi kiyalayi"....................eka athakin balanakota aththa kathawa...........ee mokada dannawada ?me loke hama kellekma ekawage nathinisa..........mama me katha kiyanne but ekak kalanam neweyi..........onna kello job walata yanawa.......eetapasse bosa layin danawa.ethakota hithenawa ara duppath kollatawada mu hondai kiyala........ethakota moko karanne?????????eeta passenda balanakota bosa ekka yalui.eka udaharanayak witharai oya..........menna thawa aththak.........kawadahari kellek oyata kiwwoth "mama oyata panawunath denawa" kiyala kawadawath eeka wishwasanam karannepa...kello hitha dunnata pana nam denna...mama kiyanna yanne eelangata thawa bohoma dukbara kathawak.meka wune mage hondama yaluwekta..........nama : - ...........................mage jiwithe mata hambawuna hondama yaluwek kiwwoth hariyatama hari..........kathawa mama passe kiyannam................sadun yaluwela hitiye ape gewal langa nangi kenek ekka.......eya iskole giye garls skul ekakata ....ee denna godak aadaren hitiya....kohomahari iskolen awut wunata passe sadunta nangiwa dakinna hambawune na..ee nangita gedarin eliyata enna widiyak thibune na eekayi....passe ohoma tika kalayak giya..kellage gedarata ayiyage yaluwek nithara yanna enna giya.ee kollage hithe me kella gana adahasak thibuna............mama oyata panawunath dennam kiyala hitapu kella karapu de hithaganna puluwanda?tika dawasakata passe kella sadunta kathakarala kiyanawa "ayiye mata oyawa bandinna ba.mama wenakenekta kamathiyi...mama eyawa bandinawa" kiyala.........ara kollata ee welawe monawage hangimak athiwenna athda?ooka thamayi kello wenaswenawa kiyanne.....................tika kalekin thaman aadare karapu kollawa amathaka karala wena kollek gana hithanna puluwan kiyanne ee kella kawadahari kasada bandamath bandapu eka amathaka karala wena ekek ekka yanna puluwan kiyana eka neda?***********************************************************************************************************************************************************************aadaraya ha mithrathwaya aththe pudumakara wenasaki.ada mithura heta pemwatha wena samajayaka api siyalloma jiwathwana bawa nam saba boruwaki.eeth yatharthaya hathpasinma wenaswuwaki.ee meseya......thama pemawathiya ayage hondama yahaluwaku samga oonawata wada hithawathkama angata menma hithata agunayaki.mokada gahaniyage saba swabhawaya awissiya haki bawini.me nisa pemwathaku thama pemawathiyata me sambandhawa nithi damima wardak natha.anek karanaya nam yam gahanu lamayaku pirimi lamayaku ha pem sabadhathawayak pawathwanne nam ,eki thanaththiya thama pemwathata pamanak aadaraya karanne nam mese thawath pirimi lamun ha oonawata wada hithawathkam pawathwanne natha.yatharthaya meyayi.namuth me desa bahirawa balana thanaththaku me desa balanne mita wiruddha asakini.eeta hethuwa ee pudgalaya sabawin aadaraya nokota thibimayi....gahaniya yanu gahaniyaki...kalugal athara manik galakda dekakda thibiya haka.namuth oba sathuwa aththe manik galak kiya nam kisiwitekath nosithanna.ee bawa thama pemwathiyata no angawa langa athi kalugala rakaganna uthsaha karanna.
